body_html: I am working on it right now. Interface for basic functionality has been reviewed and implementation is almost ready for review. The core interface just takes a TF_Graph and converts it to TF_Function. You can then add this TF_Function definition to other graphs and create TF_Operations that "invoke" it.

body: I am working on it right now. Interface for basic functionality has been reviewed and implementation is almost ready for review. The core interface just takes a TF_Graph and converts it to TF_Function. You can then add this TF_Function definition to other graphs and create TF_Operations that "invoke" it.
